title: MFM Minisode 19
description: Oakland, Vancouver, and Seattle: it's your hometown murders on this week's My Favorite Murder minisode! Karen and Georgia retell an 'I Survived'-esque story, read a pot-smoker's near brush with a killer, and more.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
